thread.title: Kristen Stewart Co-Authored a Research Paper on Artificial Intelligence
thread.title_full: Kristen Stewart Co-Authored a Research Paper on Artificial Intelligence

author: Lisa Ryan
title: Kristen Stewart Co-Authored a Research Paper on Artificial Intelligence
text:
When Kristen Stewart isn’t busy giving the middle finger to the world, she’s taking time to explore her interest in using artificial intelligence to make film. The actor and director recently co-authored a new research paper on the subject.

Published on Wednesday on ArXiv ,... More »
